nodes.name: Upload Video and Description on Facebook1

parameters.name: video_url
parameters.value:
={{ 'https://thisisabucketforaman.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/' 
   + encodeURIComponent(($('Schedule Decision Maker1').item.json['Sheet '] || '') 
   + '-' 
   + $('Schedule Decision Maker1').item.json['Ep. No.']) }}

parameter.name: image_url
parameter.value:
={{ 'https://thisisabucketforaman.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/' 
   + encodeURIComponent(($('Schedule Decision Maker1').item.json['Sheet '] || '') 
   + '-' 
   + $('Schedule Decision Maker1').item.json['Ep. No.']) }}
